chipmunk.unlimited.feedback

Class LectureReviewItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • chipmunk.unlimited.feedback.LectureItem
      • chipmunk.unlimited.feedback.LectureReviewItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<LectureItem>

    public class LectureReviewItem
extends LectureItem
    Holds the data required to define a lecture review.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LectureReviewItem

        public LectureReviewItem(java.lang.String date,
                 java.lang.String time,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String higCode,
                 java.lang.String room,
                 java.lang.String lecturer,
                 boolean[] ratings,
                 java.lang.String comment,
                 int id,
                 java.util.Date reviewDate,
                 int cloneCount)
        Parameters:
        date -
        time -
        name -
        higCode -
        room -
        lecturer -
        ratings - Array containing five values, where false is negative and true is positive.
        comment - The comment of the user. Should not be null, but an empty string on no comment.
        id - The unique ID of the review, received from the web API. For submit-instances, -1 should be passed.
        reviewDate - The date the comment was made. Null is a suitable value for submit-instances.
        See Also:
        LectureItem, LectureItem, LectureItem, LectureItem, LectureItem, LectureItem

      • LectureReviewItem

        public LectureReviewItem(LectureItem lecture,
                 boolean[] ratings,
                 java.lang.String comment,
                 int id,
                 java.util.Date reviewDate,
                 int cloneCount)
        Create a LectureReviewItem based on a LectureItem.
        Parameters:
        lecture - LectureItem to be passed to the super constructor.
        ratings - Array containing five values, where false is negative and true is positive.
        comment - The comment of the user. Should not be null, but an empty string on no comment.
        id - The unique ID of the review, received from the web API. For submit-instances, -1 should be passed.
        reviewDate - The date the comment was made. Null is a suitable value for submit-instances.
